title: Welcome to {{consultancy_name}}!
subject: Welcome aboard, {{name}}!
message:
Hi {{name}},

Welcome to {{consultancy_name}}! We're thrilled to help you achieve your dream of studying abroad. Your journey has just begun, and we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Regards,
Team {{consultancy_name}}

title: Visa Status Update
subject: Update on your Visa Application
message:
Dear {{name}},

We wanted to inform you that your visa application status has been updated. Please login to your student portal or contact your counsellor for more information.

Best,
Team {{consultancy_name}}

title: Documents Required Reminder
subject: Reminder: Submit Your Documents
message:
Hi {{name}},

This is a gentle reminder to upload the necessary documents (Passport, Marksheets, etc.) to avoid delays in your application process.

Let us know if you need help.

Thank you,
Team {{consultancy_name}}
